title: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie: Danger of a Single Story
description: A quick win: understand Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie: Danger of a Single Story.

hook.text: Adichie's TED talk has over 30 million views. It warned that a single story about any people is dangerous.

buildup.text: The Nigerian author writes about immigration, identity, and the complexities of modern Africa.

discovery.text: Americanah explored race in America through fresh eyes â€” an African woman discovering she was 'Black.'

twist.text: In Nigeria, she wasn't defined by race. In America, it became her entire identity overnight.

climax.text: Adichie made millions rethink how stereotypes form and how stories can break or reinforce them.

punchline.text: She told more stories so the world would stop telling just one.
